In step5, I mean modify extends property in XML Source Editor
In this case, when reopen this reportdesign, should throw exception Or the method isValidReferenceForCompoundElement of the tableHandle return false.
Model parser needs to consider the case that the user changes extends property manually.

Discussed with UI team. The solution is that:

1.Model provided new method ReportElementHandle.isValidLayoutForCompoundElement().
2.UI change call of ReportElementHandle.isValidReferenceForCompoundElement() to the new method.

Reassign to UI.
